info.title: Microstrate Gateway
info.description: API for managing collections, nodes, and workflows in Microstrate Hub

post.description: Creates a new collection for organizing nodes or workflows

value.error: invalid collection type. Valid types are: node, workflow

parameters.name: collection_type
parameters.description: List only 'node' or only 'workflow' collections. If this parameter is omitted, both will be listed

get.description: Retrieves a specific collection by subject

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: The topic is a hash of the name that was used when a collection was created

patch.summary: Update a Workflow or Node collection

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: The topic is a hash of the name that was used when a collection was created

delete.description: Deletes a specific collection by subject

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: The topic is a hash of the name that was used when a collection was created

parameters.name: move_resources_to_collection
parameters.description: A topic of another collection where resources can be moved

value.error: the new resource collection is not found

post.description: Creates a new node template within a collection

get.description: Retrieves a list of node templates, optionally filtered by collection and type

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: Collection topic

get.description: Retrieves a specific node by subject

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: Collection topic

parameters.name: node_topic
parameters.description: Node topic - hash of the names the node was created with

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: Collection topic

parameters.name: node_topic
parameters.description: Node topic - hash of the names the node was created with

delete.description: Deletes a specific node by subject

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: Collection topic

parameters.name: node_topic
parameters.description: Node topic - hash of the names the node was created with

patch.description: Updates multiple existing nodes in a single request

post.description: Creates a new workflow for defining node sequences

value.error: invalid ID. An ID must start with a letter or underscore and must contain only alphanumeric characters, hyphens and underscores
cannot use a reserved word as a node id:trigger
a subject is required for the function:nodeId
a subject is required for the flow:nodeId
source and target required on edge: source->target

get.description: Retrieves a list of workflows, optionally filtered by collection and type

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: Collection topic

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter workflows by type. If not specified, all types will be listed

get.description: Retrieves a specific workflow by subject

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: Collection topic

parameters.name: flow_topic
parameters.description: Flow topic - hash of the names the node was created with

patch.description: Updates an existing draft workflow's properties

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: Collection topic

parameters.name: flow_topic
parameters.description: Flow topic - hash of the names the node was created with

value.error: a valid draft subject is required

delete.description: Deletes a specific workflow by subject

parameters.name: collection_topic
parameters.description: Collection topic

parameters.name: flow_topic
parameters.description: Flow topic - hash of the names the node was created with

parameters.name: keep_draft
parameters.description: Should the draft version of the flow be kept? If not specified, both versions will be deleted.

post.description: Executes a workflow with the specified trigger data
Publishes a draft workflow to make it available for execution

value.error: a valid draft subject is required

collection_type.description: Type of the collection (node or workflow)
Type of the collection (node or workflow)

collection.description: Subject of the collection this node belongs to

subject.description: Subject identifier for function or flow node types

flat_map.description: Whether to flatten the response data

backoff_ms.description: Backoff time in milliseconds for retries

collection.description: Subject of the collection this node belongs to

subject.description: Subject identifier for function or flow node types

id.description: Optional unique identifier for the edge

position.description: Visual position of the node in the workflow editor

nodes.description: Array of nodes in the workflow

edges.description: Array of edges connecting nodes in the workflow

static.description: Static data available to all nodes in the workflow

result.description: Expression to determine the final result of the workflow

order_on.description: Field to order workflow executions by

debounce_on.description: Field to debounce workflow executions on

collection.description: Subject of the collection this workflow belongs to
Subject of the collection this workflow belongs to

subject.description: Subject of the workflow to run

trigger.description: Trigger data for workflow execution (use either trigger or triggers)

triggers.description: Multiple trigger data sets for parallel workflow execution

enable_log.description: Whether to enable logging of workflow execution

await.description: Whether to wait for workflow completion

trackingId.description: ID for tracking the workflow execution

oneOf.description: Status message for debounced or ordered executions

subject.description: Subject of the draft workflow to publish
Subject of the collection to update
Subject of the node to update

result.description: Result of the update operation with error messages

collection_type.description: Type of the collection (node or workflow)

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme
